affect ( "super_secret_door", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_AUTO, "sound/movers/doors/airlock_door01/airlock_open.mp3" );
	wait ( 1000.000 );
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_AUTO, "sound/misc/events/kam_hydraulic.mp3" );
	rotate ( < 0.000 180.000 0.000 >, 6000.000 );
	wait ( 6000.000 );
	rotate ( < 0.000 360.000 0.000 >, 6000.000 );
	wait ( 6000.000 );
	sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_AUTO, "sound/movers/doors/metal_door/metal_doorstop.mp3" );
}
